about_the_game:
Developed solo by I LOVE BIG BITS, LUSTBORN is a retro third-person action platformer that delivers an exciting single-player adventure where you shoot, jump, and navigate your way through a twisted realm of lust and depravity.

STORY

In the near future, a tear in reality opens a portal to an alternate dimension known as NEERAH'OR. A powerful demon-queen, driven by insatiable lust, seeks to infiltrate our world and spread death and depravity. In response, a global taskforce called OPUS-Y is formed. But alas, every mission into NEERAH'OR ends in disaster.

Hope remains in the discovery of a rare breed of women resistant to the demon-queen's dark magic. You play as MIA MADDEN, the latest recruit and the last known descendant of this secret lineage. Though little is known of her powers, she is the last... LUSTBORN.

WHAT TO EXPECT

  • The beautiful Mia Madden in action!

  • Challenging third-person retro gameplay

  • Arena shootouts with various weapons

  • Platforming and maneuvering through obstacles

  • Exploration and item collection

  • Finding all 5 sexy outfits (including 2 which are only available if "nudity" is turned on)

  • A unique world and lore to uncover

content_descriptors.notes: Lustborn includes some suggestive character designs. It may include nudity which can be turned on or off at the start of a new game.

name: Lustborn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (64-bit Required)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2GHz Intel or 2.8GHz AMD
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit Required)
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.66GHz Intel or 3.2GHz AMD
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 or AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: Shoot, jump, and navigate your way through a twisted realm of lust and depravity in this third-person action platformer where you play as the buxom Mia Madden... the last LUSTBORN.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese
